mapper.select: SELECT CTL_FG ,BGAJUST_FG ,TO_DT , BOTTOM_FG , BIZ_FG FROM BGTCD WHERE BGT_CD=#{bgtCd};
SELECT DEF_NM from BGTCD_TERM where DIV_FG =#{divFg};
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BGTCD WHERE parentCd = #{bgtCd}

SELECT BGTICF.BGT_CD AS BGT_CD, COALESCE(BGTCD_TERM.DEF_NM, BGTCD.DIV_FG) AS DIV_FG, ( SELECT CONCAT( IFNULL(GROUP_CONCAT(BGT_NM SEPARATOR '-'), ''), IF(BGTCD.BGT_NM IS NOT NULL AND dataPath IS NOT NULL, '-', ''), BGTCD.BGT_NM ) FROM BGTCD bgtcd_sub WHERE FIND_IN_SET(bgtcd_sub.BGT_CD, BGTCD.dataPath) ) AS dataPath FROM BGTCD JOIN BGTICF ON BGTCD.BGT_CD = BGTICF.BGT_CD LEFT JOIN BGTCD_TERM ON BGTCD.CO_CD = BGTCD_TERM.CO_CD AND BGTCD_TERM.DIV_FG = BGTCD.DIV_FG WHERE BGTCD.GISU = #{gisu} AND BGTICF.DIV_CD = #{divCd} AND BGTCD.GROUP_CD = #{groupCd} AND BGTCD.GR_FG = #{grFg} AND BGTCD.CO_CD = #{coCd};
